name: Corpse 4 Party Zombies
description:
This is the result of a test of the project done in just a month by just me, I intend to continue with the project in the future, adding new maps, weapons, characters and other mechanics, as well as I already have ideas for future special zombies and to finish yet I intend to create multiplayer mode.

Commands:

E. Usar

R. Reload

1. Primeira Arma

2. Segunda Arma
